summary: I HAVE A COMPLAINT AGAINST THE CITY OF MONTGOMERY,AL, THE COUNTY OF MONTGOMERY, AL, THE STATE OF AL ETC..  I BEEN HAVING PROBLEMS WITH MY MAIL RUNNING 6 TO 20 DAYS NOT DELIVERED.  NOW I'M HAVING PROBLEMS WITH MY CAR.  HONESTLY I DON'T TRUST THE DEALER AND THERE SERVICE DEPARTMENT WHEN IT COMES TO MY SAFETY.  FURTHERMORE I MADE A COMPLAINT WITH THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE WHEN IT CAME TO MY PRIVACY WHICH PERTAINS TO A GPS SYSTEM I FEEL WAS ATTACHED BY ALABAMA GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS BECAUSE OF THE CURRENT COMPLAINTS I HAVE AGAINST THEM.  I TOOK MY CAR IN ON 04/30/09 AT 1:00 PM FOR REPAIR AT THE BREWBAKER SERVICE DEPARTMENT. I WAS TOLD BY RONNIE A SERVICE REPRESENTATIVE THAT I WOULD GET MY CAR BACK THAT DAY AFTER A PART CAME IN.  I CHECKED ON MY CAR EVERYDAY UP TO KNOW 05/04/09.  RONNIE STILL UP TILL THIS DAY IS STATING HE IS WAITING ON A PART.  I SERIOUSLY THINK SOMETHING IS WRONG.  IT DON'T TAKE 5 DAYS TO REPAIR A CAR OR WAIT ON A PART FOR MINOR SERVICE WHICH RONNIE SAID WOULD TAKE AN HOUR TO REPAIR.  MORE IMPORTANTLY MY CAR HAS BEEN SITTING AT THIS SHOP FOR 5 DAYS FOR MINOR REPAIR AND I QUESTION THE SAFETY OF THE CAR BEING THAT I HAVE A COMPLAINT AGAINST ALABAMA GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS AND THE FACT MY PRIVACY IS BEING INVADED.  PLEASE LOOK INTO MY COMPLAINT AND JUST CONSIDER THIS A PREDETERMINATION IF I HAVE PROBLEMS WITH THIS CAR 2005 DODGE MAGNUM IN THE FUTURE.  THE COMPANY'S INFO IS BREWBAKER MOTORS CHRYSLER DODGE ETC DEALER, 300 EASTERN BYPASS, MONTGOMERY, AL 36117 (334)279-0174. *TR
